mapper.select: /* SaleRegistKmuMapper.getSaleRegistKmuList */ SELECT tssh.POS_NO, tssh.BILL_NO, DECODE(tssh.SALE_FG,'1','매출','-1','반품') AS SALE_FG, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SL_SALE_DTL tssd WHERE tssd.STORE_CD = tssh.STORE_CD AND tssd.SALE_DATE = tssh.SALE_DATE AND tssd.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO AND tssd.BILL_NO = tssh.BILL_NO AND tssd.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO ) AS BILL_DTL_CNT, tssh.TOT_SALE_AMT, tssh.TOT_DC_AMT, tssh.REAL_SALE_AMT, (tssh.REAL_SALE_AMT - tssh.VAT_AMT) AS GA_AMT, tssh.VAT_AMT, ( SELECT SUM(PAY_AMT) FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_PAY tssp WHERE tssp.STORE_CD = tssh.STORE_CD AND tssp.SALE_DATE = tssh.SALE_DATE AND tssp.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO AND tssp.BILL_NO = tssh.BILL_NO AND tssp.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO ) AS PAY_AMT, (CASE WHEN tssh.REG_ID LIKE 'WEB_REG_%' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS MOD_FG, ( SELECT tssp.PAY_CD FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_PAY tssp WHERE tssp.STORE_CD = tssh.STORE_CD AND tssp.SALE_DATE = tssh.SALE_DATE AND tssp.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO AND tssp.BILL_NO = tssh.BILL_NO AND tssp.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO ) AS SALE_GUBUN, tsshm.MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D(tsshm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR tssh, TB_SL_SALE_HDR_MEMBR tsshm WHERE 1=1 AND tssh.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tssh.SALE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND tsshm.STORE_CD (+)= tssh.STORE_CD AND tsshm.SALE_DATE (+)= tssh.SALE_DATE AND tsshm.POS_NO (+)= tssh.POS_NO AND tsshm.BILL_NO (+)= tssh.BILL_NO AND tsshm.POS_NO (+)= tssh.POS_NO ORDER BY tssh.POS_NO, tssh.BILL_NO

/* SaleRegistKmuMapper.getSelectProdList */ SELECT FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(tmp.STORE_CD, tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PATH_NM, tmp.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM, tmpb.BARCD_CD, tmp.PROD_TYPE_FG, COST_UPRC, SPLY_UPRC, NVL(tmpsp2.SALE_UPRC, 0) AS SALE_UPRC, tmp.VAT_FG FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp, TB_MS_PRODUCT_BARCD tmpb, TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 tmpsp2 --view WHERE 1=1 AND tmpsp2.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmp.PROD_CD = tmpsp2.PROD_CD(+) AND tmpsp2.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND tmp.STORE_CD = tmpb.STORE_CD(+) AND tmp.PROD_CD = tmpb.PROD_CD(+) AND tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmp.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND tmp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND tmpb.BARCD_CD LIKE '%'||#{barcdCd}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} )
